00028 #define CHN_NAME_LENGTH 32      /* length of channel names */
00029 
00030 typedef struct {
00031    char *channel_names;
00032    chid *pv_handles;
00033    float *array;
00034    INT num_channels;
00035    DWORD flags;
00036    INT cmd_disabled;
00037 } CA_INFO;
00038 
00039 
00040 void epics_ca_callback(struct event_handler_args args)
00041 {
00042    CA_INFO *info;
00043    int i;
00044 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00045    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_callback()");
00046 #endif
00047    info = (CA_INFO *) args.usr;
00048 
00049    /* search channel index */
00050    for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++)
00051       if (info->pv_handles[i] == args.chid) {
00052 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00053          cm_msg(MLOG,"","callback for channel %d", i);
00054 #endif
00055          break;
00056       }
00057 
00058    if (i < info->num_channels)
00059       info->array[i] = *((float *) args.dbr);
00060 
00061 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00062    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_callback()");
00063 #endif
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*---- device driver routines --------------------------------------*/
00067 
00068 INT epics_ca_init(HNDLE hKey, void **pinfo, INT channels)
00069 {
00070    int status, i;
00071    HNDLE hDB;
00072    CA_INFO *info;
00073 
00074 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00075    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_init(%d channels)",channels);
00076 #endif
00077    /* allocate info structure */
00078    info = calloc(1, sizeof(CA_INFO));
00079    *pinfo = info;
00080 
00081    /* disable all commands by default */
00082    info->cmd_disabled = 1;
00083 
00084    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00085 
00086    /* get channel names */
00087    info->channel_names = calloc(channels, CHN_NAME_LENGTH);
00088    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++)
00089       sprintf(info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i, "Channel%d", i);
00090    db_merge_data(hDB, hKey, "Channel name",
00091                  info->channel_names, CHN_NAME_LENGTH * channels, channels, TID_STRING);
00092 
00093    /* initialize driver */
00094    status = ca_task_initialize();
00095    if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL)) {
00096       cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Unable to initialize! ca_task_initialize() "
00097                                       "returned 0X%x",status);
00098       return FE_ERR_HW;
00099    }
00100 
00101    /* allocate arrays */
00102    info->array = calloc(channels, sizeof(float));
00103    info->pv_handles = calloc(channels, sizeof(void *));
00104    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++)
00105       info->pv_handles[i] = calloc(1, sizeof(chid));
00106 
00107    /* search channels */
00108    info->num_channels = channels;
00109 
00110    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
00111       status = ca_search(info->channel_names+CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i, &info->pv_handles[i]);
00112       if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
00113          cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "ERROR 0X%x returned by ca_search(%s)",
00114                 status, info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i);
00115    }
00116 
00117    if ((status=ca_pend_io(5.0)) == ECA_TIMEOUT) {
00118       for (i = 0; i < channels; i++)
00119          if (ca_state(info->pv_handles[i]) != cs_conn)
00120             cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Not connect to %s",
00121                    info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i);
00122    } else if (status != ECA_NORMAL) {
00123      // NIY unknown status
00124    }
00125 
00126    /* add change notifications */
00127    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
00128       /* ignore unconnected channels */
00129       if (ca_state(info->pv_handles[i]) != cs_conn) {
00130          // NIY ignoring unconnected channel %s
00131          continue;
00132       }
00133       status = ca_add_event(DBR_FLOAT, info->pv_handles[i], epics_ca_callback,
00134                             info, NULL);
00135       if (!(status & ECA_NORMAL))
00136          cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "channel %s ca_add_event() returned 0X%x",
00137                 info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i, status);
00138    }
00139 
00140    if ((status=ca_pend_io(5.0)) == ECA_TIMEOUT) {
00141       for (i = 0; i < channels; i++)
00142          if (ca_state(info->pv_handles[i]) != cs_conn)
00143             cm_msg(MERROR, "epics_ca_init", "Not connect to %s",
00144                    info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * i);
00145    } else if (status != ECA_NORMAL) {
00146      // NIY unknown status
00147    }
00148 
00149    /* enable all commands by default */
00150    info->cmd_disabled = 0;
00151 
00152 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00153    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_init()");
00154 #endif
00155    return FE_SUCCESS;
00156 }

00158 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00159 
00160 INT epics_ca_exit(CA_INFO * info)
00161 {
00162    int i;
00163 
00164 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00165    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_exit()");
00166 #endif
00167 
00168    ca_task_exit();
00169 
00170    if (info->pv_handles) {
00171       for (i = 0; i < info->num_channels; i++)
00172          if (info->pv_handles[i]) {
00173             free(info->pv_handles[i]);
00174             info->pv_handles[i] = NULL;
00175          }
00176       free(info->pv_handles);
00177    }
00178 
00179    if (info->array)
00180       free(info->array);
00181    if (info->channel_names)
00182       free(info->channel_names);
00183 
00184    free(info);
00185 
00186 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00187    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_exit()");
00188 #endif
00189    return FE_SUCCESS;
00190 }

00200 
00201 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00202    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_set()");
00203 #endif
00204    return FE_SUCCESS;

00207 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00208 
00209 INT epics_ca_set_all(CA_INFO * info, INT channels, float value)
00210 {
00211    INT i;
00212 
00213 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00214    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_set_all(%d channels)",channels);
00215 #endif
00216    for (i = 0; i < MIN(info->num_channels, channels); i++)
00217       ca_put(DBR_FLOAT, info->pv_handles[i], &value);
00218 
00219 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00220    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_set_all()");
00221 #endif
00222    return FE_SUCCESS;
00223 }

00225 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00226 
00227 INT epics_ca_set_label(CA_INFO * info, INT channels, char *label)
00228 {
00229    int status;
00230    char str[256];
00231    chid chan_id;
00232 
00233 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00234    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_set_label(channel %d, label %s)", channels, label);
00235 #endif
00236    sprintf(str, "%s.DESC", info->channel_names + CHN_NAME_LENGTH * channels);
00237    status = ca_search(str, &chan_id);
00238 
00239    status = ca_pend_io(2.0);
00240    if (status != ECA_NORMAL)
00241       printf("%s not found\n", str);
00242 
00243    status = ca_put(ca_field_type(chan_id), chan_id, label);
00244    ca_pend_event(0.01);
00245 
00246 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00247    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_set_label()");
00248 #endif
00249    return FE_SUCCESS;
00250 }

00252 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00253 
00254 INT epics_ca_get(CA_INFO * info, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00255 {
00256 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00257    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_get(channel %d)",channel);
00258 #endif
00259    ca_pend_event(0.0001);
00260    if (pvalue) *pvalue = info->array[channel];
00261 
00262 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00263    if (pvalue)
00264      cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_get(value = %f)",*pvalue);
00265    else
00266      cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_get(NULL pointer to return)");
00267 #endif
00268    return FE_SUCCESS;
00269 }
00270 
00271 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00272 
00273 INT epics_ca_get_all(CA_INFO * info, INT channels, float *pvalue)
00274 {
00275    int i;
00276 
00277 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00278    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca_get_all(%d channels)", channels);
00279 #endif
00280    for (i = 0; i < MIN(info->num_channels, channels); i++)
00281       epics_ca_get(info, i, pvalue + i);
00282 
00283 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00284    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca_get_all()");
00285 #endif
00286    return FE_SUCCESS;
00287 }
00288 
00289 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00290 
00291 INT epics_ca(INT cmd, ...)
00292 {
00293    va_list argptr;
00294    HNDLE hKey;
00295    INT channel, status;
00296    DWORD flags;
00297    float value, *pvalue;
00298    CA_INFO *info;
00299    char *label;
00300 
00301    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00302    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00303 
00304 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00305    cm_msg(MLOG,"","++epics_ca(CMD=%d)",cmd);
00306 #endif
00307    if (cmd == CMD_INIT) {
00308       void *pinfo;
00309 
00310       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00311       pinfo = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00312       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00313       flags = va_arg(argptr, DWORD);
00314       status = epics_ca_init(hKey, pinfo, channel);
00315       info = *(CA_INFO **) pinfo;
00316       info->flags = flags;
00317    } else {
00318       info = va_arg(argptr, void *);
00319 
00320       /* only execute command if enabled */
00321       if (cmd & info->cmd_disabled)
00322          status = FE_ERR_DISABLED;
00323       else
00324          switch (cmd) {
00325          case CMD_INIT:
00326             break;
00327 
00328          case CMD_EXIT:
00329             status = epics_ca_exit(info);
00330             break;
00331 
00332          case CMD_SET:
00333             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00334             value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00335             status = epics_ca_set(info, channel, value);
00336             break;
00337 
00338          case CMD_SET_ALL:
00339             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00340             value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00341             status = epics_ca_set_all(info, channel, value);
00342             break;
00343 
00344          case CMD_SET_LABEL:
00345             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00346             label = va_arg(argptr, char *);
00347             status = epics_ca_set_label(info, channel, label);
00348             break;
00349 
00350          case CMD_GET:
00351             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00352             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00353             status = epics_ca_get(info, channel, pvalue);
00354             break;
00355 
00356          case CMD_GET_ALL:
00357             channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00358             pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00359             status = epics_ca_get_all(info, channel, pvalue);
00360             break;
00361 
00362          default:
00363             break;
00364          }
00365    }
00366 
00367    va_end(argptr);
00368 
00369 #ifdef MIDEBUG
00370    cm_msg(MLOG,"","--epics_ca()");
00371 #endif
00372    return status;
00373 }
